attributes.action: Totally ABOLISH the TV TAX (aka. Licence) and REPLACE it with ADVERTISING like BBC AMERICA and BBC CANADA have !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BBC America, and BBC Canada (which NO ONE in the UK can recieve, advertise, and generate income for the BBC over here, so why should we be forced to PAY for something the americans get for FREE !!!

SCRAP this outdated stupid, crap and pointless TELLY TAX.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
